thread.title: BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.27

title: BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.27
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:06 AM / in 6 minutes BRIEF-Financial Engines Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $0.27 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Financial Engines Inc:
* FINANCIAL ENGINES REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * Q1 REVENUE ROSE 12 PERCENT TO $127.8 MILLION
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47
* ASSETS UNDER MANAGEMENT AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WERE $169.3 BILLION
* ASSETS UNDER CONTRACT AS OF MARCH 31, 2018 WERE $1.22 TRILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
